info.description: This is v1.0 of the Viscomp dataset.

questions.description: I join a group of sports enthusiasts. We met twice a month to discuss sports history. Every meeting someone picked out of sport and made a presentation of the history of that sport. This week was the history of track and field. I thought it was going to be boring, but it ended up being quite interesting learning about the players of our past.
questions.question: what colour is used to mark the boundaries?

questions.description: Family gathering for a night out. Child eating spaghetti happily. Grandma enjoying the meal and the company of her family. Hugging with a full stomach. In the future more family to join.

questions.description: Today, I went to a history museum with Grandpa, Dad, and Sister. Sister and I enjoyed the exhibits very much. Grandpa was a little sick but he said he liked it. We got medicine for Grandpa and he felt much better. We went to a restaurant and Dad loved the seafood.
questions.question: with whom did the kids go ?

questions.description: The parade was so much fun to watch yesterday. There were so many whimsical looking vehicles. They were mostly older cars that we don't use anymore. I wonder where they keep them. There were also very decorative floats. At the end of the parade there were some goofy looking bicycles.
questions.question: what was at the parade?
multiple_choices: There was vehicles decorative floats and bicycles

questions.description: After much discussion, our family finally chose Mexico as our summer vacation destination.  This building reminds me of Hansel and Gretel's gingerbread house, covered with frosting and flavorful treats.  I don't know if I like the looks of this guy, he's pretty scary.  This monument is so ornate, it make me feel I was in Disneyland for a moment.  And this giant iguana gave me goosebumps, he was just so cool.
questions.question: how many plus signs are there?

questions.description: We woke up and it had snowed all night! It was a winter wonderland. We put a jacket on our dog and he was off and running around the yard. The trees were covered in snow and ice. Even the ducks looked cold out there. The pond was almost covered in snow.

questions.description: The friends decided to have an old-school game night. The first game was Jenga. The point is to see how high you can stack the blocks before someone knocks them over. Next up was Twister, where you spin and see which colored circles you have to put your hands and feet on. With a few people playing, it can get really crowded.
questions.question: what was the event in the story?

questions.description: Tonight I took a selfie of myself in the snow. I stood here screaming at the snow to cease! CEASE SNOW!!! It started to snow even harder so I screamed louder. CEASE YOU SNOW!!! I heard a rumble and all the sudden. The snow under me threw me across the sidewalk. I landed on my side!! Scared I jumped up and pointed at that snow. I said "Well played snow, well played!" Then I walked home.
